This is a session dedicated to multivariate data visualization using some tipical feature of automobile.

```{r, echo=FALSE, comment=NA, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(formattable)
dataset <- read.csv("C:/07 - R Website/dataset/Graph/mtcars.csv")
dt <- dataset[1:8, 1:12]
kable(dt) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "responsive", full_width = T, position = "center")

```
